1982 Ohio State Buckeyes football teamIn: The game was held on October 9, with an attendance of 88,344 at Ohio Stadium in Columbus, OH. The Buckeyes played against the 1982 Wisconsin Badgers football team and lost 0–6.

On September 25, the game had an attendance of 89,436 at Ohio Stadium in Columbus, OH. The Buckeyes, ranked #13, faced the 1982 Stanford Cardinal football team and suffered a loss, with a final score of 20–23.

This game took place on November 20, attracting a crowd of 90,252 at Ohio Stadium in Columbus, OH. The Buckeyes played against the #13 Michigan Wolverines from the 1982 season, winning the match with a score of 24–14.
Held on October 2, the game saw an attendance of 89,491 at Ohio Stadium in Columbus, OH. The Buckeyes competed against the 1982 Florida State Seminoles football team but lost with a score of 17–34.
